meaningMnemonic: A <radical>big</radical> <radical>turkey</radical> has to <radical>measure</radical> a safe before he can <kanji>rob</kanji> it. If the safe is too big it won’t fit in his getaway van and the robbery will have been a failure. So before the turkey robs the place he needs to measure the safe.
readingMnemonic: The safe that the turkey is trying to <kanji>rob</kanji> ends up being <reading>uber</reading> (うば) big. Like, really uber big. So uber big that the turkey can’t even measure it with his tape measure. There’s no way he’s gonna be able to rob this place.
